SELECT MOVIE_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MOVIE (MOVIE_NUMBER, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SUMMARY, MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE, MOVIE_RUNTIME, MOVIE_PRICE, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_PREVIEW, GENRE_NUMBER) VALUES(#{movieNumber}, #{movieTitle}, #{movieSummary}, #{movieReleaseDate}, #{movieRuntime}, #{moviePrice}, #{moviePoster}, #{moviePreview}, #{genreNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MOVIE_NUMBER, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SUMMARY, M.MOVIE_RELEASE_DATE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, M.MOVIE_PRICE, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_PREVIEW, G.GENRE_NAME FROM MOVIE M JOIN GENRE G ON M.GENRE_NUMBER = G.GENRE_NUMBER WHERE M.MOVIE_NUMBER = #{movieNumber}

SELECT LINE_REVIEW_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LINE_REVIEW (LINE_REVIEW_NUMBER, LINE_REVIEW_CONTEXT, MEMBER_NUMBER, MOVIE_NUMBER) VALUES(#{lineReviewNumber}, #{lineReviewContext}, #{memberNumber}, #{movieNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT LR.LINE_REVIEW_NUMBER, LR.LINE_REVIEW_CONTEXT, M.MEMBER_ID, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, MV.MOVIE_NUMBER FROM LINE_REVIEW LR FULL OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON LR.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER FULL OUTER JOIN MOVIE MV ON LR.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE LINE_REVIEW_NUMBER = #{lineReviewNumber}
